section_a.beneficiaries: a range of communities within west Cornwall, West Cornwall is a rural area which has been recognised as having particularly high deprivation. Currently there is no dedicated gymnastic faciiity within the area able to provide the purpose built equipment required. The company will provide a gymnastics club for the local community. It wilf be available primarily for the children of west Cornwell, of all ages, providing a high quality sports coaching/training facility for gymnastics and a range of associated disciplines. It will also offer sessions for adults and subsidised sessions for disabled and disadvantaged children and young people
